title: Halo
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Downstairs restaurant offers vegetarian choices, using fresh local ingredients, of which some can be made vegan. The upstairs bar offers craft beer and wine with vegetarian and vegan appetizers. Easy online ordering for pickup orders. Located across the street from the MUSC Horseshoe.
